_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:18:38 using v2.0
title: How has the proportion of carers feeling involved changed by age?
analysis_commentary: Carers aged 25 to 34 make up the lowest proportion of those who felt involved or consulted in both years the survey was conducted and the general trend increased with age in both years.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Social Services Survey of Adult Carers in England
